languages.text: "Я сохраню жизнь рабочим, ибо их вина не доказана. Пусть трудятся на корабле, но под надзором блюстителей".

traits.locale_text: "Я сохраню жизнь рабочим — пусть трудятся на корабле, но под надзором блюстителей".

languages.text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."
languages.original_text: "Я сохраню жизнь рабочим, ибо их вина не доказана. Пусть трудятся на корабле, но под надзором блюстителей".

traits.locale_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."
"I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."
"I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

"I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

languages.text: «Perdonaré la vida a los trabajadores, pues su culpa no ha quedado demostrada. Que sigan trabajando en la nave, pero bajo la supervisión de los guardias».
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: «Perdonaré la vida a los trabajadores, pues su culpa no ha quedado demostrada. Que sigan trabajando en la nave, pero bajo la supervisión de los guardias».

languages.text: 「労働者の命は助ける。彼らの罪は証明されていないのだから。とりあえず、彼らを船上で労働させよう。しかし、エンフォーサーの監視下に置こう」
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: 「労働者の命は助ける。彼らの罪は証明されていないのだから。とりあえず、彼らを船上で労働させよう。しかし、エンフォーサーの監視下に置こう」

languages.text: “我打算饶过这些工人的性命，因为没有证据证明他们犯下过罪行。让他们继续在船上劳动，但需要执法者进行监督。”
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: “我打算饶过这些工人的性命，因为没有证据证明他们犯下过罪行。让他们继续在船上劳动，但需要执法者进行监督。”

languages.text: "Ich werde das Leben der Arbeiter verschonen, denn ihre Schuld ist nicht erwiesen. Lasst sie auf dem Schiff arbeiten, allerdings unter der Aufsicht der Enforcer."
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde das Leben der Arbeiter verschonen, denn ihre Schuld ist nicht erwiesen. Lasst sie auf dem Schiff arbeiten, allerdings unter der Aufsicht der Enforcer."

languages.text: « Je vais épargner les ouvriers, car leur culpabilité est loin d'être avérée. Qu'ils travaillent sur le vaisseau, sous la supervision des prévôts. »
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais épargner les ouvriers, car leur culpabilité est loin d'être avérée. Qu'ils travaillent sur le vaisseau, sous la supervision des prévôts. »

languages.text: "Suçları kanıtlanmadığı için işçilerin canlarını bağışlayacağım. İnfazcıların gözetimi altında gemideki işlerine devam etsinler."
languages.original_text: "I shall spare the lives of the workers, for their guilt is unproven. Let them labour on the ship, but under the supervision of the enforcers."
